recipe_instructions: 1. Cook the PPFarm Farmhouse Whole Grain pasta according to package directions. 2. While pasta cooks, melt butter in a saucepan. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the saucepan with the melted butter. 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 5. Toss to coat the pasta evenly with butter and seasoning. 6. Serve immediately.

1. Cook Allegra Elbows pasta according to package directions. 2. Drain the pasta and return it to the pot. 3. Stir in Ragu Classic Alfredo sauce until the pasta is evenly coated. 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 5. Serve immediately.

1. Cook the PPFarm Farmhouse Whole Grain pasta according to package directions. 2. While the pasta cooks, heat the Cream-O-Land Whole Milk in a saucepan. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the saucepan with the warm milk. 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 5. Stir until the pasta is coated in milk and serve immediately.

extra_ingredients: garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper
recipe_instructions: 1. Cook Allegra Elbows pasta according to package directions. 2. While pasta cooks, mix together garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the bowl with the seasoning. 4. Toss to coat the pasta evenly with the seasoning. 5. Serve immediately.
1. Cook Allegra Elbows pasta according to package directions. 2. Drain the pasta and serve it with the Ragu Classic Alfredo sauce on the side for dipping. 3. Enjoy!
